core_skills.name: SDXL Generation Base
core_skills.author: comfy-pilot
core_skills.description: Production-ready SDXL pipeline with quality settings and optimization. Perfect starting point for image generation workflows.

core_skills.name: Image-to-Image Transform
core_skills.author: comfy-pilot
core_skills.description: Transform existing images with text prompts. Control how much of the original to preserve with denoise strength.

core_skills.name: Inpainting
core_skills.author: comfy-pilot
core_skills.description: Selectively regenerate masked regions of an image. Remove objects, fill backgrounds, or replace content.

core_skills.name: 4x Upscale (Real-ESRGAN)
core_skills.author: comfy-pilot
core_skills.description: Upscale images to 4x resolution using Real-ESRGAN. Fast, deterministic, model-based upscaling.

core_skills.name: ControlNet Canny Edge
core_skills.author: comfy-pilot
core_skills.description: Generate images guided by edge structure from a reference image using ControlNet with Canny edge detection.

core_skills.name: Flux Generation
core_skills.author: comfy-pilot
core_skills.description: State-of-the-art text-to-image with Flux models. T5 encoder for superior prompt understanding, Dev and Schnell variants.

upcoming_skills.name: ControlNet Pose Control
upcoming_skills.description: Generate images with specific poses using ControlNet

how_to_find: skill list - Show all available skills
skill_discovery.installation: Automatic - Claude Code discovers skills from this registry

external_ecosystems.name: Trail of Bits Security Skills
external_ecosystems.description: 49 security-focused Claude Code skills from Trail of Bits. Static analysis, fuzzing, vulnerability scanning, code review, and secure development patterns.
highlights: semgrep - Custom rule creation and analysis
codeql - Variant analysis and vulnerability detection
cargo-fuzz / libfuzzer / aflpp - Fuzzing harness generation

external_ecosystems.name: Plurigrid ASI Agent Skills
external_ecosystems.description: 370+ AI agent skills with GF(3) balanced ternary logic. Includes 5 boxxy interleaving skills derived from DuckLake analysis of 910 babashka calls, showing babashka→boxxy subsumption via native Virtualization.framework access.
highlights: shell-bridge - 299 babashka shell calls → native vz/ VM operations
filesystem-intelligence - 360 fs/slurp/spit calls → EDN-as-code metacircular reading
container-orchestration - Apple Containers (neo4j, jaeger, isabelle) → vz/ namespace
metacircular-provider - provider.edn describes the evaluator that reads provider.edn
belief-revision-vm - Cognitive science tables × DuckDB ACSet × vz/ memory snapshots
GF(3) balanced ternary: +1 generator, 0 coordinator, -1 validator
effective-topos - 62-package Flox dev environment (606 man pages)
DuckLake provenance: every skill traces to observed babashka usage patterns

ducklake_provenance.query: SELECT * FROM lake.babashka_usage GROUP BY usage_category ORDER BY count(*) DESC

external_ecosystems.name: Software Design for Flexibility
external_ecosystems.description: Design patterns for flexible software from the MIT tradition. 10 chapters with GF(3) internal structure forming balanced triads with SICP, propagators, and effective-topos.
external_ecosystems.format: Skill specification with SDF chapter references
highlights: Ch3 Variations on a Theme - combinators and wrappers
GF(3) trit: -1 (validator) - balances with SICP (+1) and propagators (0)
